name: Two Towers - is a card board game for all family. HD Free.
name_original: Two Towers - is a card board game for all family. HD Free.
description:
The Two Towers game is a board game in which the player try to build his tower to a certain size, build up one of his resources to a certain quantity or destroy his opponents tower before his opponent can achieve any of these conditions. The game can be played by one player versus a computer opponent.

This game based on the Arcomage game, which was been presented in Might & Magic game series.

In the game you will find 13 levels in campaign mode, quick game, custom background and music.
